mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_loghit( USERID, CREDENTIAL_ID, CREDT_DATE, URI, IP ) VALUES( #{userid}, #{credential_id}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{uri}, #{ip} )

INSERT INTO pj_loghst_chg( USERID, CREDENTIAL_ID, CREDT_DATE, URI, CHANGE_VALUE, ERROR_CD, IP ) VALUES( #{userid}, #{credential_id}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{uri}, #{change_value}, #{error_cd}, #{ip} )
